name: ORGANISATION
title: ORGANISATION
description: Generic description of organisations. An organisation is a legally constituted body whose existence (in general) outlives the existence of parties considered to be part of it.

element.short: Generic description of organisations. An organisation is a legally constituted body
element.definition: Generic description of organisations. An organisation is a legally constituted body whose existence (in general) outlives the existence of parties considered to be part of it.
